message_1: John wants to encrypt the message "HELLO" using the Caesar cipher with a shift of 3. What will be the encrypted message?
message_2:
To encrypt the message "HELLO" using the Caesar cipher with a shift of 3, we shift each letter in the message 3 positions forward in the alphabet. If the shift goes beyond 'Z', we wrap around to the beginning of the alphabet.

H -> K
E -> H
L -> O
L -> O
O -> R

The encrypted message is "KHOOR".
